0.text: Innate: Caitlyn's basic attacks generate a stack of Count on-attack, doubled if she is within  brush. At 6 stacks, or 5 while in brush, her next basic attack consumes all stacks to become a Headshot.
0.html: Innate: Caitlyn's basic attacks generate a stack of Count on-attack, doubled if she is within brush. At 6 stacks, or 5 while in brush, her next basic attack consumes all stacks to become a Headshot.

1.text: Headshot: Caitlyn's basic attack is empowered to have an  uncancellable windup and deal 60 / 90 / 120% (based on level) (+ (131.25% +  26.25%) critical strike chance) AD bonus physical damage, increased to 110 / 115 / 120% (based on level) (+ (131.25% +  26.25%) critical strike chance AD against non-champions.

1.text: Caitlyn periodically stocks a Yordle Snap Trap charge, up to a maximum amount. Deploying traps beyond the maximum destroys the oldest one.
1.html: Caitlyn periodically stocks a Yordle Snap Trap charge, up to a maximum amount. Deploying traps beyond the maximum destroys the oldest one.

2.text: The next enemy champion that springs the trap is  rooted for 1.5 seconds and  revealed for 3 seconds, as well as takes additional damage from  Headshot. Trapped targets become immune to further Yordle Snap Traps for 3 seconds.
2.html: The next enemy champion that springs the trap is rooted for 1.5 seconds and revealed for 3 seconds, as well as takes additional damage from Headshot. Trapped targets become immune to further Yordle Snap Traps for 3 seconds.

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Cloudburst: Dash to the target location, though not through terrain, and fire three homing missiles at the most wounded enemy within 750 units of you at the end of the dash, prioritizing enemy champions. Each missile deals 60 − 105 (based on level) (+ 15% bonus AD) magic damage, for a total of 180 − 315 (based on level) (+ 45% bonus AD), increased by 0% − 50% (based on target's missing health) (110 second cooldown; 200 - 425 range).
active.originText: UNIQUE – CLOUDBURST:  Dash to the target location, though not through terrain, and fire three homing missiles at the most wounded enemy within  750 units of you at the end of the dash, prioritizing enemy champions. Each missile deals 60 − 105 (based on level) (+ 15% bonus AD) magic damage, for a total of 180 − 315 (based on level) (+ 45% bonus AD), increased by 0% − 50% (based on target's missing health) (110 second cooldown; 200 - 425 range).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 2% bonus movement speed.
